eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Ashtabula; Cuyahoga; Erie; Geauga; Huron; Lake; Lorain; Medina; Portage, OH; AT 06:27 PM ON SEP 14, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 06:42 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: The Brunswick Police Department in Medina County has issued an AMBER Alert for 7 year old Ty'Juan Baymon. Last seen at his home. Last seen wearing no shirt, unknown bottoms, wearing a gold chain necklace. Suspect is Tiarika Baymon, 32 year old female. She is known to drive a 2014 silver Ford Escape with a queen sticker on the upper left rear window. License plate Ohio KIG1234,. The vehicle is believed to be traveling east into Pennsylvania with an unknown destination. Anyone having information on this abduction please call the tipline at 330-558-6809 or dial 911.
